m:MaterialLabel.text: This set of slides gives an outline of cloud computing with examples of using the Google Cloud Platform in the implementation of ChemConnect. In addition, the ChemConnect database is introduced. Presented at the COST Action 1404 SMARTCATS workshop.

SlideShare: This set of slides gives an outline of cloud computing with examples of using the Google Cloud Platform in the implementation of ChemConnect. In addition, the ChemConnect database is introduced. Presented at the COST Action 1404 SMARTCATS workshop.
